Edge AI Lab

Edge AI via system–algorithm co-design

Explore Research

Vision

We advance Edge AI for real-world deployment at scale: system–algorithm co-design for low latency, low power, and high reliability, building reusable, verifiable, and deployable solutions (placeholder).

Research Themes

View all

端侧部署与系统优化

edge computing, on-device, scheduling, and runtime

面向低时延与高可靠的边缘端系统协同优化，覆盖算力感知调度、编译优化与运行时管理（占位）。

模型压缩与量化

compression, quantization, pruning, and distillation

面向边缘端的轻量化模型设计与自动化压缩，包括剪枝、蒸馏、量化与NAS（占位）。

TinyML 与硬件感知共设计

tinyml, co-design, mcu, and accelerator

软硬件一体化方法，针对微控制器与专用加速器进行算法-架构共设计（占位）。
